description:
“I’ll perform perfectly as usual. To bring happiness to everyone with my singing.” Diva’s daily performances on the main stage are sold out, and she has cemented her position as the indisputable AI songstress of NiaLand. She is invited to perform at the Zodiac Signs Festival, which will feature AI singers from around the world, but is pulled into a precarious situation during the rehearsal. At that moment, a cube-shaped AI that she has never seen before appears in front of her and…
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Galaxy Anthem -歌でみんなを幸せにするために-
Galaxy Anthem: To Make Everyone Happy with My Singing
Galaxy Anthem: Uta de Minna o Shiawase ni Suru Tame ni
